data.name: Slot Machine
data.description:
Costs 1¢ to play.

The slots on the machine will spin and give a payout if all 3 of them land on the same icon.

Possible payouts

• 54% - nothing
• 11.4% - coin
• 9.3% - heart
• 5.7% - 2 coins
• 4.7% - pill
• 4.7% - bomb
• 3.1% - key
• 3.1% - neutral fly
• 2% - self-destruct with an explosion (check the "When destroyed" section)
• 1.56% - Pretty Fly orbital (same as Pretty Fly)
• 0.47% - self-destruct and spawn A Dollar or Portable Slot

On Hard Mode, the chances for a payout are halved.

When destroyed

• 78% - 2-3 random pickups (35%: 1-3 coins; 20% - heart; 30% - bomb; 15% - key)
• 10% - pill
• 10% - trinket
• 1% - random chest
• 1% - Locked Chest

data.name: Blood Donation Machine
data.description:
Costs half a heart to play. Prioritizes red hearts first.

Starting from Chapter 4, costs a full heart to play.

Not having enough HP to play can kill Isaac.

Possible payouts

• 1-3 coins of any type (only 1 if playing on Hard Mode). When playing as Keeper or Tainted Keeper, 0-1 coins.
• Rarely drops Child's Heart.
• Explodes, giving one of the final payouts.

Final payout

One of the following:
• Blood Bag
• IV Bag

Multiple Blood Bags can appear per run, but only 1 IV Bag can spawn.

When destroyed

• Several coins or hearts.

data.name: Fortune Telling Machine
data.description:
Costs 1¢ to play.

Possible payouts

• 65% - displays a random fortune text or seed on screen
• 10.7% - trinket
• 10.7% - soul heart
• 10.7% - card/rune
• 1.75% - self-destruct (cannot hurt Isaac) and spawn several random pickups
• 1.16% - self-destruct and spawn Crystal Ball

When destroyed

• 78% - 2-3 random pickups (35%: 1-3 coins; 20% - heart; 30% - bomb; 15% - key)
• 10% - pill
• 10% - trinket
• 1% - random chest
• 1% - Locked Chest

data.name: Beggar
data.description:
Costs 1¢ to play.

Possible payouts

• Random pickup.
• Random card.

On Hard Mode, the first payout will happen after at least 6 donations, while on other modes payout may happen after any amount of donations.

Final payout

•   +35% chance for an Angel Room.
• 50% - one of the following items: Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Dessert, Rotten Meat.
• 50% - item from the Beggar item pool.

When destroyed

•   +35% chance for an Angel/Devil Deal.
• Spawns several random pickups.

data.name: Devil Beggar
data.description:
Costs half a heart to play. Prioritizes red hearts first.

Starting from Chapter 4, costs a full heart to play.

Not having enough HP to play can kill Isaac.

Possible payouts

• 25% → Random card.
• 25% → Random pill.
• 12.5% → Random trinket.
• 37.5% → Final payout.

On Hard Mode, the first payout will happen after at least 6 donations, and any subsequent payout requires at least 3. On other modes, payout may happen anywhere between 1-8 donations.

Final payout

•   -10% chance for an Angel Deal.
• Item from the Demon Beggar item pool.

When destroyed

•   +35% chance for an Angel/Devil Deal.
• 2 enemy spiders.

data.name: Shell Game
data.description:
Costs 1¢ to play.

When given a coin, the beggar will lift one of the skulls up, revealing a coin, bomb, red heart, key, or Skatole. He will then shuffle the skulls around and wait for Isaac to bump into one of them, which will result in a payout.

The skull Isaac bumps into is not relevant.

Leaving the room before bumping into a skull will reset the prize.

Even though a Shell Game item pool exists, it is not used by this machine.

Possible payouts

• 2 of the previously shown pickup, or 3 if a coin was shown. These can be of any variant.
• Enemy Attack Fly.

Final payout

• Skatole

When destroyed

• Spawns several random pickups.

data.name: Key Master
data.description:
Costs 1 key to play.

Can consume a  Golden Key to guarantee the final payout.

Possible payouts

• Random chest.

Final payout

• Item from the Key Master item pool.
• Or Paper Clip.

When destroyed

•   +35% chance for an Angel/Devil Deal.
• Several random pickups.

data.name: Donation Machine
data.description:
Touching the machine will donate 1¢ to it, increasing the displayed total by one.

The total amount of donations persist between runs and contribute towards unlocking specific items, and upgrading the shop, resulting in better shop layouts.

Donation Machines cannot appear while achievements are disabled.

Possible payouts

• 2% chance to grant   +1 luck.
• 0.15% chance to jam the machine, making it unavailable for the rest of the run. This chance increases by +0.15% with each coin donated during the run.
•   increase Angel Room chance for every 10 pennies donated.

Final payout

• Happens when donating the 1000th penny, which makes the machine explode, spawning ~12 dimes.
• This will reset the total amount of donations back to 0¢, without reverting any previously unlocked achievements or shop upgrades.

When destroyed

• 7-14 pennies. These pennies, plus an additional 1 penny, are deducted from the total amount of donations.
• The machine stays destroyed for the rest of the run.

data.name: Bomb Bum
data.description:
Costs 1 bomb to play.

Can consume a  Golden Bomb to guarantee the final payout.

Has explosion immunity and can only be destroyed by Mama Mega!, Mega Bean, Mega Mush and Larynx.

Possible payouts

• 1-3 pennies.
• Random heart.

Final payout

• Item from the Bomb Bum item pool.

When bombed

• Spawns 6 Troll Bombs around the room.
• His own Troll Bombs cannot make him spawn more bombs.

When destroyed

•   +35% chance for an Angel/Devil Deal.
• Drops several random pickups.

data.name: Shop Restock Machine
data.description:
For the cost of 1¢, has a chance to reroll all item pedestals in the room.

If used inside a shop, it won't reroll items that are not part of the shop (spawned via another mechanic). It will also reroll the pickups inside it, and empty shop slots will be refilled.

After the 4th reroll, the machine has a chance to break with every penny inserted, and a 50% chance to every subsequent reroll.

Can be used to restock the shop in the Mirrored World.

When destroyed

• Spawns 0-3 coins.
• Rerolls all item pedestals.

data.name: Greed Donation Machine
data.description:
Appears after defeating Ultra Greed in  Greed Mode.

Touching the machine donates 1¢ to it, incrementing the displayed amount of donations.

Donations persist between runs and contribute toward unlocking certain achievements.

Each donation has a chance to jam the machine, which is shown under the health bar. Each character has a separate jam chance that persists between runs. Modded characters always have a 100% jam chance.

The jam chance maxes out at 20% at 200¢ in  Greed Mode, and at 1% at 55¢ in  Greedier Mode.

Donating the 1000th coin will drop ~12 dimes, and reset the total donation amount.

The machine is immune to any type of explosion and cannot be destroyed in any way.

data.name: Mom's Dressing Table
data.description:
Randomizes Isaac's appearance based on the set of items he has when bumped into.

Usually appears in Bedrooms.

When destroyed

• 99% - 1-4 pills.
• 1% - random Mom item: Mom's Underwear, Mom's Heels, Mom's Lipstick, Mom's Bra, Mom's Pad, Mom's Eyeshadow, Mom's Contacts, Mom's Wig, Mom's Perfume, Mom's Pearls.

data.name: Battery Bum
data.description:
Costs 1¢ to play.

Possible payouts

• 1-3 charges to Isaac's active item, able to go over the normal charge amount, up to a maximum of 2 full charges.
• Micro Battery
• Lil' Battery
• Watch Battery
• AAA Battery

If holding multiple active items, priority will be given to charging them regularly before overcharging.

Final payout

• Random item from the Battery Bum item pool.

When destroyed

• Drops several random pickups, a pill, or a trinket.
•   +35% chance for an Angel/Devil Deal.

data.name: Hell Game
data.description:
Costs half a heart to play. Prioritizes red hearts first.

Starting from Chapter 4, costs a full heart to play.

Not having enough HP to play can kill Isaac.

When given a heart, the beggar will lift one of the skulls up, revealing a  Black Heart, Blue Spider, bomb, item, key, coin, or card. He will then shuffle the skulls around and wait for Isaac to bump into one of them, which will result in a payout.

The skull Isaac bumps into is not relevant.

Leaving the room before bumping into a skull will reset the prize.

If a Devil Deal has been taken during the run, there is a 25% chance that a  Shell Game will be replaced with a Hell Game.

Possible payouts

• 2 of the previously shown pickups, 1 if it was a Black Heart or a card, or 2-3 if they were coins.
• Enemy Spider.

Final payout

• Random item from the Devil Room item pool.

When destroyed

• Spawns 2 Enemy Spiders.
data.unlock: Unlock: Defeat Mega Satan as Tainted Azazel.

data.name: Crane Game
data.description:
Costs 5¢ to play.

The machine will display one random item from the Crane Game item pool, and can give up to 3 items before exploding.

Bumping into the machine has a 25% chance to pay out with the displayed item, and 75% to do nothing.

Curse of the Blind! affects the Crane Game item, when displayed, and when won.

If all items in the item pool have been picked up, the Crane Game will only dispense Buddy in a Box.

When destroyed
Drops several random pickups.
data.unlock: Unlock: Defeat Mega Satan as Tainted Samson.

data.name: Confessional
data.description:
Costs half a heart to play. Prioritizes red hearts first.

Starting from Chapter 4, costs a full heart to play.

Not having enough HP to play can kill Isaac.

Has a 30% chance to pay out on Normal Mode, and 25% on Hard Mode.

Possible payouts

• 5% - explode (cannot hurt Isaac), and spawn several random pickups
• 3.3% - explode (cannot hurt Isaac) and grant the final payout
• Removes a Broken Heart, if Isaac has one.
• 50% - Soul Heart
• 10% - Eternal Heart
• "You Feel Blessed!": removes the floor's curse, grants   +10% Angel Room chance, and allows Isaac to find an Angel Room even if a Devil Deal has already been taken. If no Devil Deal has been taken, the Angel Room becomes guaranteed for that floor.

Final payout

• Spawns an Angel Room item, or Redemption if a Devil Deal has been made during the run.

When destroyed

• Spawns several random pickups.
data.unlock: Unlock: Defeat Mega Satan as  Tainted Bethany.

data.name: Rotten Beggar
data.description:
Costs 1¢ to play.

Every 3rd (sometimes less, rarely 4th) coin donated will result in a payout.

Rotten Beggars have an 8% chance to replace  Beggars.

Possible payouts

• 1-3 Blue Flies
• 1-3 Blue Spiders
• Bone Heart
• Rotten Heart
• Fish Head
• Fish Tail
• Rotten Penny
• Bob's Bladder
• Fart

Final payout

•   +10% chance for an Angel Room.
• Item from the Rotten Beggar item pool.

When destroyed

•   +35% chance for an Angel/Devil Deal.
• Spawns 2 Small Maggots.
• Chance to drop a Rotten Heart.
data.unlock: Unlock: Defeat Mega Satan as Tainted Apollyon.

data.name: Guppy
data.description:
Obtained by acquiring any 3 items with the  guppy tag.

Grants Isaac flight and spawns a Blue Fly 66% of the time when a tear hits an enemy.

data.name: Beelzebub
data.description:
Obtained by acquiring any 3 items with the  fly tag.

Grants Isaac flight and converts small enemy flies into Blue Flies.

Larger enemy flies such as Boom Flies, Pooters, Suckers, Moters, will become permanently charmed and follow you between rooms.

data.name: Fun Guy
data.description:
Obtained by acquiring any 3 items with the  mushroom tag.

  +1 full Red Heart container.

data.name: Seraphim
data.description:
Obtained by acquiring any 3 items with the  angel tag.

  +3 Soul Hearts.

Grants flight.

data.name: Bob
data.description:
Obtained by acquiring any 3 items with the  bob tag.

Makes Isaac leave green poisonous creep on the ground that deals 20 damage per second.

Grants poison immunity.

data.name: Spun
data.description:
Obtained by acquiring any 3 items with the  syringe tag.

  +2 damage.
  +0.15 speed.

Spawns a random pill.

data.name: Yes Mother?
data.description:
Obtained by acquiring any 3 items with the  mom tag.

Grants a stationary Mom's Knife that trails behind Isaac and deals 2x Isaac's tear damage on contact.

The knife synergizes as the item would.

data.name: Conjoined
data.description:
Obtained by acquiring any 3 items with the  baby tag.

  -0.3 tears.
  -0.3 damage.

Causes Isaac to shoot 3 tears simultaneously, of which 2 are fired diagonally.

data.name: Leviathan
data.description:
Obtained by acquiring any 3 items with the  devil tag.

  +2 Black Hearts.

Grants flight.

Can be obtained as a rare reward from Sanguine Bond.

data.name: Oh Crap
data.description:
Obtained by acquiring any 3 items with the  poop tag.

Causes Isaac to heal half of a red heart each time a poop pile is destroyed.

Has a 6.66% chance to activate The Poop every time the timer hits 00.

data.name: Bookworm
data.description:
Obtained by acquiring any 3 items with the  book tag.

Causes Isaac to fire an additional tear 25% of the time.

data.name: Adult
data.description:
Obtained after consuming 3 Puberty pills.

  +1 full Red Heart container.

Makes Isaac's voice deeper.

data.name: Spider Baby transformation
data.description:
Obtained by acquiring any 3 items with the  spider tag.

Spawns a spider familiar that slowly walks towards enemies and applies random status effects upon touching them.

data.name: Stompy
data.description:
Obtained by acquiring any 3 items that increase Isaac's size, such as Leo, Magic Mushroom and One makes you larger.

Grants Isaac the ability to crush rocks upon touching them.

Upon taking damage, Isaac has a 20% chance to create a circular rock wave that deals 20 damage per second to any enemy caught in it.

The rock waves cannot destroy machines.

Causes Isaac to create dust clouds as he walks.

data.name: Super Bum
data.description:
Obtained by holding Bum Friend, Dark Bum and Key Bum at the same time.

Combines all 3 aforementioned familiars into Super Bum who automatically collects all coins, red hearts and keys off the ground and drops twice as many rewards as the regular bums would have.

This also applies to items, as 2 items will be dropped whenever one would.

A unique animation plays when the transformation is acquired. See the video link below.

data.name: Necromancer
data.description:
Obtained by acquiring the following 3 items and trinkets: The Necronomicon, A Missing Page, and Missing Page 2.

Changes The Necronomicon's display sprite and gives it a special purple charge bar that can be used 10 times per floor.

After the 10th use, The Necronomicon gets back its old sprite and the charge bar is reverted to the usual 4-pip bar, but fully depleted.

The purple bar is restored when traveling to the next floor.

The Necronomicon cannot be recharged normally while the purple bar is active.

data.name: Curse of Darkness!
data.description: Makes the floor much darker, and barely lit by Isaac's aura.

data.name: Curse of the Labyrinth!
data.description:
Makes the floor contain 2 Boss Rooms one after another, 2 item rooms, and count as 2 floors.

Only the final Boss Room can spawn an Angel/Devil Deal.

Can only appear on the first floor of a chapter.

data.name: Curse of the Lost!
data.description:
Removes the map from the HUD.

Increases the total room count of the floor to the size of the next floor.

data.name: Curse of the Unknown!
data.description:
Hides Isaac's health from the HUD.

Despite being hidden, health works normally.

data.name: Curse of the Cursed!
data.description:
Changes every normal door into a cursed door that contains spikes which deal half a heart of damage to Isaac.

Unlike Curse Rooms, these doors deal damage from both ways when flown through.

 Only available during the Cursed! challenge, or via the CVRS ED seed.

data.name: Curse of the Maze!
data.description:
Entering a new room has a chance to take Isaac to the wrong room, indicated by a subtle screen-shake and sound effect. This can also happen when teleporting between rooms.

Discovered rooms can randomly swap contents with another room of the same size.

data.name: Curse of the Blind!
data.description: All item icons are replaced with a question mark, making them impossible to distinguish until picked up.
